breeds.name: Kurilian
breeds.temperament: Independent, highly intelligent, clever, inquisitive, sociable, playful, trainable
breeds.description: The character of the Kurilian Bobtail is independent, highly intelligent, clever, inquisitive, sociable, playful, trainable, absent of aggression and very gentle. They are devoted to their humans and when allowed are either on the lap of or sleeping in bed with their owners.
